channel.title: [474]innovation client help, black screen when loading the client LOOK GOT PIC
channel.description: [URL=http://img259.imageshack.us/i/60450870.png/][IMG]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/504/60450870.png[/img][/URL] that pops up while im trying to run client and my innovation source. run.bat code [code]@echo off cd ./bin/ @title InnovationX java -Xmx1024m client 0 highmem pause[/code] ERRORS THAT POP UP ON THE RUN.BAT WHILE CLIENT POPS UP [code]InnovationX Client Version #2.2 C:\Documents and Settings\william C:\Documents and Settings\william java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\william\.innovationxPVP _file_store_32\maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:106) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:66) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:41) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:36) at client.startUp(client.java:7797) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:72) at client.run(client.java:5127) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662) C:\Documents and Settings\william C:\Documents and Settings\william C:\Documents and Settings\william Error: loaderror Starting up 20 java.lang.NullPointerException at Stream.read3Bytes(Stream.java:155) at StreamLoader.<init>(StreamLoader.java:10) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4183) at client.startUp(client.java:7812) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:72) at client.run(client.java:5127) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)[/code] can anyone help me with getting my innovation client fixed so i can start working on my innovation based server?

item.title: [474]innovation client help, black screen when loading the client LOOK GOT PIC
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2
item.description:
@sonsofgod2 wrote:

go to tools on ur web. then internetoption then advance. then click restore advanxce settings. then reset. then reload ur client.

Read full topic

item.title: [474]innovation client help, black screen when loading the client LOOK GOT PIC
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:


that pops up while im trying to run client and my innovation source.
run.bat code

@echo off cd ./bin/ @title InnovationX java -Xmx1024m client 0 highmem pause
ERRORS THAT POP UP ON THE RUN.BAT WHILE CLIENT POPS UP

InnovationX Client Version #2.2 C:\Documents and Settings\william C:\Documents and Settings\william java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\william\.innovationxPVP _file_store_32\maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:106) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:66) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:41) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:36) at client.startUp(client.java:7797) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:72) at client.run(client.java:5127) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662) C:\Documents and Settings\william C:\Documents and Settings\william C:\Documents and Settings\william Error: loaderror Starting up 20 java.lang.NullPointerException at Stream.read3Bytes(Stream.java:155) at StreamLoader.<init>(StreamLoader.java:10) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4183) at client.startUp(client.java:7812) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:72) at client.run(client.java:5127) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)
can anyone help me with getting my innovation client fixed so i can start working on my innovation based server?

Read full topic
